ahms/visualizations

gitlab_items <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent elements in GitLab ( #4564 ) . In Gitlab ( #4564 ) configurations and source code for 'AHMS' ( #4829 ) are stored">

Edit
Disable
ahms/messages <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane contain tasks that represent ahms message categories, ahms message types, key value pairs and columns used in these message types">

Edit
Disable
ahms/data pipelines <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within this swimlane ( #5930) represents a data pipeline in 'AHMS' ( #4829). See also category 'ahms/data pipeline' ( #5931)">

Edit
Disable
ahms/lambda/items <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within this swimlane ( #5927) represents lambda functions with the 'AHMS' ( #4829). See also category 'ahms/lambda' ( #5928)">

Edit
Disable
ahms/api/items

Edit
Disable
integration items <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within swimlane 'integration items' ( #6281) represents interfaces ( #6282) or 'network connections' ( #7274 ) required for integration purposes.">

Edit
Disable
Remove
ahms/connections <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within this swimlane ( #6305) represents a technical connection between two solutions/components required for AHMS ( #4829 ). See also category 'ahms/connection' ( #6306) Caution: An ahms/interface ( #6282) is not the same. An interface ( #6282) makes use of a connections ( #6306) to exchange information between two solutions.">

Edit
Disable
categories <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent an entry in the category list. You can add explanations for which kind of Kanban task the category should be uses.">

Edit
Disable
Remove
tags <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent tags used in this project">

Edit
Disable
swimlanes <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent the meaning of a swimlane. Describe here the purpose and usage of a dedicated swimlane">

Edit
Disable
Remove
locations <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent locations, like AWS regions or on prem data centers, or local sites from BA and BT">

Edit
Disable
building_blocks <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent platforms, building blocks (bb) in platforms, components in bb. Naming convention for task title and task.Category see sub tasks. ">

Disable
Remove
history <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent important milestones in the past">

Disable
links

Remove
objects <span class="tooltip" title="
kanban task in this swimlane contain 'objects' that are relevant for any solution in BIS">

Edit
Disable
terms <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent a term or acronym or abbreviation. Title naming convention is 'term: <the term>'">

Edit
Disable
Remove
processes <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane represent a process">

Edit
Disable
Remove
active_directory_items <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane represent A) user account B) a-dash account or C) role assignments">

Edit
Disable
Remove
meetings <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane represent important meetings in the project. Tile convention: 'meeting: <yyymmdd>: <meeting name>">

Edit
Disable
reports <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent reports on Kanban, means a url to a kanban search with a set of filters">

Edit
Disable
artifacts <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane 'artifacts' ( #6206) represent an artefact. They can be used to represent offers, proposals, desgn document ect.... See also category 'artefact/offer' ( #6205 ) 'artefact/sow' ( #6262)">

Edit
Disable
Remove
products <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task within this swimlane represent tools , products and solutions from IT vendors. Our BIS building blocks are based on these products">

Edit
Disable
Remove
atr_requets <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task with this swimlane represent an ATR request. See also category 'atr_request'">

Edit
Disable
Remove
templates <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane represent templates. Purpose of a template is to describe how tasks in certain swimlanes should be created (e.g category to be uses, naming convention for title, ect..). Users should create new tasks in kanban by creating a duplicate from the corresponding template.">

Edit
Disable
Remove
bis_services <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane represent services in BIS ( #). A' new starter request' for example is a service.">

Edit
Disable
Remove
it_resources <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane represent a concrete instance of an IT resource. Can be a 'BT laptop' ( #4730 ) or 'BA laptop' ( #4715), or a VM in BT / BA data center, or a EC2 machine in Amazon ( #5185), an 'EMR cluster' ( #5188 ) / 'Redshift cluster' ( #5186), or a 'virtual laptop' ( #5179 ) in AWS based on AMZ Workspaces">

Edit
Disable
obsolet <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task in this swimlane have become obsolet. probably replaced by another task. YOu can keep the original task and link it to new one to keep track of history">

Disable
Remove
manuals <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within this swimlane refer to user manuals">

Remove
finance_items <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks in this swimlane refer finance items. See category 'finance/purchasing_order' ( #5627 )">

Disable
Remove
opportunities <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban task within this swimlane represent opportunities. For example opportunities to use data lake in a business project.">

tools <span class="tooltip" title="
Kanban tasks within this swimlane ( #5859 ) represent supporting tools and libraries">

div.p: Kanban tasks within this swimlane ( #5927) represents lambda functions with the 'AHMS' ( #4829). See also category 'ahms/lambda' ( #5928)
